about.description: Our app is built to bring your design ideas to life.
about.feature1: On the web, you can use our 3D editor to design your room exactly the way you want. Move furniture and customize its colors in real time.
about.feature2: Once you're happy with your design, you can switch to our mobile app to view your creation in augmented reality. Walk through your room as if it's already built to see how it fits your space and make live edits.
about.feature3: Whether you're planning a remodel or dreaming up your perfect room, our app makes it easy to turn your vision into reality.
